YT Boxing
Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself. Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from. I have so much to be grateful for. Good things are always coming into my life. New opportunities await me at every turn. I have the courage to follow my heart. Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
KSI. Jake Paul. Salt Papi Deji Tommy Fury Slim Albaher

Ali Stair is worth $1 million. Anderson Silva is worth $2 million. Andrei Arlovski is worth $3 million. BJ Penn is worth $4 million. Brock Lesnar is worth $5 million. Conor McGregor is worth $6 million. Georges St-Pierre is worth $7 million. Khabib Nurmagomedov is worth $8 million. Rorion Gracie is worth $9 million. Tito Ortiz is worth $10 million.

Toss until well combined, adding some pasta water if needed //maggi Maggi Noodles

Maggi Masala Add one and half cup of water 
Add maggi noodles and boil it 
Add the maggi masala on to it 
Wait for 2 mins 
Maggi is ready! //cake Maggi Noodles
